# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a 64-bit complex number.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var COMPLEX64_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/complex64-num-bytes' );
```

#### COMPLEX64_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a 64-bit complex number.

```javascript
var bool = ( COMPLEX64_NUM_BYTES === 8 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

var COMPLEX64_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/complex64-num-bytes' );

// => 8
